name: IMKServer
desc: The IMKServer class manages client connections to your input method.  When you write the main function for your input method, you create an IMKServer object.  You should never need to override this class.

items.name: init!(name: String!, bundleIdentifier: String!)
items.desc: Creates and returns a server object from property list information contained in the provided bundle.

items.name: init!(name: String!, controllerClass: AnyClass!, delegateClass: AnyClass!)
items.desc: Creates and returns a server object initialized with the provided parameters.

items.name: func bundle() -> Bundle!
items.desc: Returns an NSBundle object for the input method.
